original_text: But a certain man drew his bow at random and struck the king of Israel between the scale armor and the breastplate. Therefore he said to the driver of his chariot, “Turn around and carry me out of the battle, for I am wounded.”
korean_text: 한 사람이 무심코 활을 당겨 이스라엘 왕의 갑옷 솔기를 쏜지라 왕이 그의 병거 모는 자에게 이르되 내가 부상하였으니 네 손을 돌려 나를 진중에서 나가게 하라 하였으나

sentences.original_text: But a certain man drew his bow at random
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 어떤 사람이 활을 무작위로 당겼다

sentences.original_text: and struck the king of Israel
between the scale armor and the breastplate.
Therefore he said to the driver of his chariot,
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 그는 그의 병거 모는 자에게 말했다

sentences.original_text: and carry me out of the battle,
